sgcool_label_text:Published in Malaysia
 the Majallah Bahasa Kebangsaan was an educational magazine that encouraged and promoted the learning of Malay the national language among Chinese. Published in Malaysia
 the Majallah Bahasa Kebangsaan was an educational magazine that encouraged and promoted the learning of Malay the national language among Chinese.
